text: Herviella exigua is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Herviella exigua (Risbec, 1928). Accessed on 2018-02-20. ==Distribution== This species was described from New Caledonia.Rudman, W.B., 1999 (April 9) Herviella exigua (Risbec, 1928). [In] Sea Slug Forum. Australian Museum, Sydney. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1928
title: Herviella exigua
